description: When I'm summoned, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Enraged Yeti</style></link> in the top 3 cards of your deck.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create an Enraged Yeti in the top 3 cards of your deck.
flavorText: "Caught nothing all week! Either those beasts are onto me, or something's scaring 'em off..."
name: Avarosan Trapper
